actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Provisions of Measure Incorporated Into H.R.4333.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the port use excise tax shall not apply to cargo transported between Hawaii and any possession of the United States, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the port use excise tax cargo transported between Alaska, Hawaii, and any U.S. possession for ultimate use or consumption at one of such places.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the port use excise tax shall not apply to cargo transported between Hawaii and any possession of the United States, and for other purposes.
